description: RackN Digital Rebar through 4.6.14, 4.7 through 4.7.22, 4.8 through 4.8.5, 4.9 through 4.9.12, and 4.10 through 4.10.8 has exposed a privileged token via a public API endpoint (Incorrect Access Control). The token can be used to escalate privileges within the Digital Rebar system and grant full administrative access.
